      • checkout

        @RequestMapping(path="/checkout",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> checkout(@RequestParam(name="name")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(name="address")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String address,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(name="postalCode")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String postalCode,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(name="city")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String city,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(name="phone")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String phone)
        Buys all the products in cart.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the buyer
        address - Address of the buyer
        postalCode - Postal code of the buyer
        city - City of the buyer
        phone - Phone of the buyer
        Returns:
        Response

      • modifyCart

        @RequestMapping(path="/modify",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ShoppingCartItem> modifyCart(@RequestParam(name="product")
                                                                                                                                        int productId,
                                                                                                                                        @RequestParam(name="quantity")
                                                                                                                                        int quantity)
                                                                                                                                 throws OutOfStockException
        Modifies contents of the shopping cart.
        Parameters:
        productId - Product ID to modify, if -1, clears the cart
        quantity - New quantity for the product, if less than 1, removes the product
        Returns:
        Shopping cart item
        Throws:
        OutOfStockException - Exception
